official-title.#text:
To ensure stability in FHA maximum mortgage amount limitations for areas experiencing decreases in
			 median home prices.

sponsor.#text: Mr. Gary G. Miller of California

cosponsor.#text: Mrs. Carolyn B. Maloney of New York
